snippet: A new television spot from Representative Todd Akin, a Republican, calls the attacks leveled on behalf of his opponent, Senator Claire McCaskill, "misleading, deceptive, false."
abstract: A new television spot from Representative Todd Akin, a Republican, calls the attacks leveled on behalf of his opponent, Senator Claire McCaskill, "misleading, deceptive, false."

headline.main: Negative Ad, a First for Akin, Goes Up in the Missouri Senate Race
